citation_details.title: ChineseEEG: A Chinese linguistic corpora EEG dataset for semantic alignment and neural decoding
citation_details.author: X Mou, C He, L Tan, J Yu, H Liang, J Zhang, Y Tian
citation_details.abstract: An Electroencephalography (EEG) dataset utilizing rich text stimuli can advance the understanding  of how the brain encodes semantic information and contribute to semantic decoding
